name: FocusFlow
shortDescription: A focused-work session manager with adaptive timers and distraction blocking.
description: Schedules Pomodoro-like focused sessions that adapt based on user performance, integrates site/app blocking, and provides analytics on attention patterns.
monetization: Freemium (basic free, premium advanced analytics & team features)

name: LocalHarvest
shortDescription: Discover and trade locally-grown produce and homemade goods.
description: Marketplace connecting local growers and makers with neighbors; includes pickup scheduling, seasonal availability calendar, and simple listings.

name: MicroHabit
shortDescription: Tiny daily habit builder using micro-actions and reminders.
description: Encourages lasting habit formation by breaking goals into micro-actions (30s–2min) with adaptive scheduling and gamified streaks.
monetization: One-time purchase or subscription for advanced features

name: Recipe Remix
shortDescription: Generate recipes from what's in your fridge and dietary preferences.
description: Input available ingredients and dietary restrictions; returns ranked recipe ideas, shopping suggestions, and portion adjustments.

name: MeetPrep
shortDescription: Prep assistant for meetings: agendas, concise briefs, and follow-ups.
description: Generates meeting agendas from goals, summarizes meeting notes, assigns action items, and integrates with calendar and chat tools.

name: PocketLedger
shortDescription: Simple personal finance tracker with goal-based saving.
description: Track income & spending quickly, set savings goals, visualize progress, and get low-effort budgeting tips.

name: SkillSwap
description: Users offer short lessons or skill sessions in exchange for credits or barter; includes scheduling, ratings, and short course bundles.

name: Wardrobe Wizard
shortDescription: Virtual closet and outfit planner with weather-aware suggestions.
description: Upload clothing items, tag outfits, plan looks on a calendar, and get suggestions based on weather and events.

name: QuietSpace
shortDescription: Find nearby quiet places to work or study with user reviews.
description: Map-based discovery of quiet cafes, libraries, and co-working spots with noise level tags, seating info, and reservation links.

name: CodeSnack
shortDescription: Daily bite-sized coding challenges with in-app editor and hints.
description: Short focused coding puzzles (5–15 minutes) across languages, progress tracking, mentor hints, and leaderboard.
monetization: Subscription for premium problems and hints
